sentence.Network_en: A group of men suddenly emerged from a doorway and moved menacingly forward to block her way.
sentence.Network_cn: 一群男子突然出现在门口，并且向她逼近，堵住了她的去路。

sentence.Network_en: Beware - the birds fly menacingly low and stalk their victims!
sentence.Network_cn: 小心野人低空飞行,否则会成为它们的刀下之魂.

sentence.Network_en: Menacingly, they also stole computer discs listing the businessmen involved.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了表示出他们的威胁性, 他们还盗窃了列举有关商人清单的电脑光盘.

' Be careful , gringo ,' he said menacingly , before sliding away .他在溜走之前威胁地说，“当心点，外国佬！”
The rock , bigger than a sports arena , menacingly close to our planet every few years ., 这个比运动竞技场更大的石块每隔几年就充满威胁地坠落得离我们的星球更近.

entry.def: If someone or something looks menacing, they give you a feeling that they are likely to cause you harm or put you in danger.

example.ex: The strong dark eyebrows give his face an oddly menacing look...
example.tran: 两道浓黑的眉毛使他的脸看起来异常凶狠。

example.ex: He moved  his menacing bulk closer to the table...
example.tran: 他把自己骇人的庞大身躯向桌子挪近了些。

sentences.sentence: "the voice at the other end of the line dropped menacingly"

auth_sentence.content: Behind him, though, the young guns were ranged menacingly.
auth_sentence.res_content: Behind him, though, the young guns were ranged menacingly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Behind him, though, the young guns were ranged menacingly.

auth_sentence.content: "I see," he said menacingly, gritting his teeth.
auth_sentence.res_content: "I see," he said menacingly, gritting his teeth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "I see," he said menacingly, gritting his teeth.

auth_sentence.content: He wagged his finger menacingly and barked orders for us to come with him.
auth_sentence.res_content: He wagged his finger menacingly and barked orders for us to come with him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He wagged his finger menacingly and barked orders for us to come with him.
